data.enText: to make sth look bigger than it really is, for example by using a lens or microscope
bacteria magnified to 1 000 times their actual size
an image magnified by a factor of 4
to make sth bigger, louder or stronger

data.chText: 高高的屋顶使声音更响亮。
data.enText: The sound was magnified by the high roof.

data.chText: 干燥的夏季加剧了缺水的问题。
data.enText: The dry summer has magnified the problem of water shortages.

data.chText: 夸大（重要性或严重性）；夸张
data.enText: to make sth seem more important or serious than it really is

simple_means.memory_skill: magn 大 + ify 使…，…化 → 放大；夸大

tr: increase in size, volume or significance
example: Her terror was magnified in her mind

tr: to enlarge beyond bounds or the truth
example: tended to romanticize and exaggerate this `gracious Old South' imagery

value.def: To magnify an object means to make it appear larger than it really is, by means of a special lens or mirror.

example.ex: This version of the Digges telescope magnifies images 11 times...
example.tran: 这种型号的迪格斯望远镜可将图像放大11倍。

example.ex: A lens would magnify the picture so it would be like looking at a large TV screen.
example.tran: 透镜会把图片放大，就像在看巨大的电视屏幕一样。

value.def: To magnify something means to increase its effect, size, loudness, or intensity.

example.ex: Poverty and human folly magnify natural disasters...
example.tran: 贫困和人类的愚昧加剧了自然灾难。

example.ex: Their noises were magnified in the still, wet air.
example.tran: 他们的喧闹声在凝滞而潮湿的空气中显得更吵了。

example.ex: ...using bank loans to magnify his buying power.
example.tran: 利用银行贷款加强他的购买力

value.def: If you magnify something, you make it seem more important or serious than it really is.

example.ex: They do not grasp the broad situation and spend their time magnifying ridiculous details...
example.tran: 他们不去把握大局，而是在细枝末节上花费时间大做文章。

example.ex: Any signs of discontent tend to be magnified and overanalyzed.
example.tran: 稍有不满便会被上纲上线。

partsOfSpeech.dec: magn 大 + anim 生命，精神 + ity 具备某种性质，状况 → 大精神，大心胸 → 心胸博大
magn 大 + ate 表人 → 巨头，权贵
magnify的名词
magni 大 + fic 做 + ence 表状态 → 做得很大 → 宏大
magni 大 + fy 使… → 使…大 → 放大
magni 大 + loqu 说话 + ent 关于…的 → 说大话的 → 吹牛的
magn 大 + itude 表状态 → 大的状态 → 宏伟
beauty 美 + ify 使 → 美化
cert 搞清，区别 + ify 使 → 使清楚 → 证明
class 种类 + ify 使 → 分类，归类
code 编码 + ify 使 → 编成法典；编纂
dign 高贵的 + ify 使 → 使尊贵，使高贵
diverse 多样的 + ify 使 → （使）多样化
example 例子 + ify 使 → 举例证明
fort 要塞 + ify 使 → 筑防御工事
glor 光荣 + ify 使 → 使）光荣 → 颂扬
horror 恐惧 + ify 使 → （使）恐惧
humid 潮湿的 + ify 使 → 使潮湿
intense 强烈的 + ify 使 → 加强
just 正义的 + ify 使 → 表明或证明…正当（或有理）的
partsOfSpeech.d: 表明或证明…正当（或有理）的

partsOfSpeech.dec: lique 液体 + fy 使 → （使）液化
magn 大 + ify 使 → 放大；夸大
mod 模式 + ify 使 → 使模式化 → 修改
null 无效的 + ify 使 → 使无效，抵消
oss 骨 + ify 使 → 硬化，骨化
pur 纯洁 + ify 使 → 净化
satis 饱，满 + fy 使 → （使）满足
ugly 丑陋的 + ify 使 → 丑化
